unnormalised: Hey guys, interesting read! My granddad, Ramlal, used to say, too much pesticide ruins the soil. We saw it firsthand near Panipat. Remember the Bt cotton issues in 2010?
normalised: Hey guys, interesting read! My granddad, Ramlal, used to say, too much pesticide ruins the soil. We saw it firsthand near Panipat. Remember the B T cotton issues in two thousand and ten?

unnormalised: Now everyone's pushing organic farming. Heard Krishi Vigyan Kendra in Haryana is running workshops on it - maybe worth checking out! Plus, less headache on 26/01! What do you think? 08/03/2024, 17:00 hrs is their next session, apparently. Costs around Rs. 500.
normalised: Now everyone's pushing organic farming. Heard Krishi Vigyan Kendra in Haryana is running workshops on it - maybe worth checking out! Plus, less headache on twenty sixth January! What do you think? Eighth March two thousand and twenty four, seventeen zero zero hours is their next session, apparently. Costs around rupee five hundred.
